ygData.subject: Re: On robes
ygData.msgSnippet: Please carefully read my post before you post telling me I m wrong...It only makes mention of colored guild robes the other robesa are found and are NOT class
ygData.messageBody:
Please carefully read my post before you post telling me I'm wrong...It only makes mention of colored guild robes
the other robesa are found and are NOT class specific (Black flowing and Damask). Please read the post carefully
before accusing someone of being wrong.

Skylee
----- Original Message -----
From: Chad Eldridge
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 4:09 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] On robes


Sorry skylee but your wrong about robes not being guild specific when it comes to the illustrious Erudite robes. They give more mana and are guild or class specific. There are certain robes, each being a different color, for all 4 spell classes (wizard, magician, enchanter, necro).
